fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Customs, Single market, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Main area of concern in terms of the EU is around Brexit. Due to the proximity of the border our members are concerned about traiffs, movement of people and the status of goods and services across the seamless border once the UK leaves the EU.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Letterkenny Chamber is the premier business membership organisation in Donegal and works for the interests of the business community while also promoting economic development in the region with a range of partners and key stakeholders. 
Letterkenny Chamber is in Business for Business acting as a voice for it’s members and the wider business community.
relevant_communication:
Attendance at various Brexit events, press statements and interviews locally and nationally regarding the border.  
We are also represented by Chambers Ireland on various policy issues.
